Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory53.jpg'}
{2: '【kuroname】', 3: 'Are you alone?'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: "It's just me.", 4: '1'}
{3: "It's always been just me."}
{3: 'Solitude is how everyone came into this world and how most people are. I have often fallen back on this aloof coldness to deter the people who tried to make conversation.'}
{2: '【kuroname】', 3: 'What a coincidence, I\'m "just me" too.'}
{3: "It was an answer I hadn't heard before. Perhaps the person timed it just right, but the first thing that greeted me when I looked up was a smile."}
{3: 'An abashed smile, to be sure, but with no lack in warmth.'}
{3: 'Just the smile to put me at a loss...'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: 'How could someone called "top gun" pretend to understand, to sympathize? Someone like you would never understand what I feel.', 4: '1'}
{2: '【kuroname】', 3: 'I do.'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: 'What is that supposed to mean...', 4: '1'}
{2: '【kuroname】', 3: 'Want to come with me?'}
{2: '【kuroname】', 3: 'I have a dream, but I cannot make it real on my own.'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: "Wouldn't any other team do?", 4: '1'}
{2: '【kuroname】', 3: 'No one but you will do. No one understands solitude like you. No one yearns to connect like you.'}
{2: '【kuroname】', 3: 'Will you help me, Lucia?'}
{3: 'The person extended a hand. I knew I should extend mine, but...'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: "Picking a team like mine won't help you. Babylonia will never clear an under-staffed team for combat operations.", 4: '1'}
{2: '【kuroname】', 3: "Then we'll just have to go find staff. We have to start somewhere."}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: 'Starting somewhere...', 4: '1'}
{2: '【kuroname】', 3: "It doesn't matter if we start from nothing, whether we're top of the class or bottom of the barrel. None of it matters."}
{2: '【kuroname】', 3: 'Because from this nothingness of new beginnings, the most precious things will come.'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: 'Most precious... Could I... ever find such a thing?', 4: '1'}
{2: '【kuroname】', 3: 'You will. I promise.'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: 'What... is it that you want to do?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Eradicate the Punishing Virus', 3: '32', 4: "See smiles on everyone's faces", 5: '36', 6: "I haven't decided yet", 7: '42'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: "Eradicate the Punishing Virus... Do you think it's even possible? Eradicating something we know next to nothing about?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: "I don't know why, but... something tells me that if I follow you, anything is possible...", 4: '1'}
{3: 'It was a strange feeling, but every word from the person in front of me filled me with confidence.'}
{3: 'And with it, the courage to lay down everything in pursuit of those words.'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: "Smiles on everyone's faces. You are a weird one... Ah, forgive me. I misspoke.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: "If it is possible, I too would like to see smiles on everyone's faces.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: 'What a world it would be, to inspire such joy in everyone.', 4: '1'}
{3: "Listening to 【kuroname】's words, I began to imagine such a world, and my place in it."}
{3: "At least I wouldn't be alone in such a world. Then, if someone were to ask me again, if it was just me..."}
{3: 'In that world, I may be able to say no. "No, everyone\'s here."'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: "You... haven't decided what to do next?", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Such powerful words, only to be followed by such indecision.'}
{3: 'The person to be my commandant merely saw me there, and walked over, and that was that.'}
{3: "Such was Commandant's personality."}
{3: 'And so I took the hand.'}
{3: 'And I will never, ever let go.'}
